content: This is a repository for Arch Linux' [pacman](https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Pacman) package manager.
It contains a variety of packages; mostly my own software and AUR builds.

notice.variables.content: You can leave the variable `$arch` as-is, or you can replace it with a supported architecture - `any` or `x86_64`.

notice.openpgp.content: All packages are signed and can be verified using my OpenPGP public key [`${keyName}`](${keyUrl}).
